attributes.action: support our forces not make them redundent
attributes.additional_details: we as a country are reputed to have the best forces in the world so why is it that the powers that be seem intent on destroying our forces by laying off our service personnel like there going out of fashion and and scrapping our warships it seems without a care also getting rid of squadrons and units from the RAF and army and obviously navy leaving this country vulnerable to attack from any mad man or organisation that wishes to do so. our governments say that there's no money so how is it they seem to be able to find millions of £'s to give in aid to other countries instead of soughting out our own problems first i was always told charity begins at home obviously our government don't think so
